attributes.action: Make Nursing Homes FREE For UK Citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Respect our old folk. Stop immediately, the practice of forcing them to sell their homes to pay for nursing care. They are the people that gave us life. We are entitled to give them a stress free end to their own lives!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
